join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add everest It's anyone's (_PARAMETER_OR_Everest_).
send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!everest
send hortbot #foobar [HB] It's anyone's Everest.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!everest game
send hortbot #foobar [HB] It's anyone's game.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add everest It's anyone's (_PARAMETER_1_OR_Everest_). Right, (_P_2_OR_dude_)?
send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!everest
send hortbot #foobar [HB] It's anyone's Everest. Right, dude?

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!everest game
send hortbot #foobar [HB] It's anyone's game. Right, dude?

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!everest game ; friend
send hortbot #foobar [HB] It's anyone's game. Right, friend?


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add everest It's anyone's "(_P_OR__)".
send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!everest
send hortbot #foobar [HB] It's anyone's "".

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!everest foobar
send hortbot #foobar [HB] It's anyone's "foobar".
